id.description: A unique identifier for the user as a GUID.

title.description: The title or name of the item.

description.description: A detailed description of the item.

ownerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this item (must reference a user with isSeller = true).

startAuctionDateTime.description: The start date and time for the auction of this item.

endAuctionDateTime.description: The end date and time for the auction of this item.

createdDate.description: The date and time when the item was created.

startPrice.description: The starting price for the auction of this item.

vurdertPrice.description: The estimated value of the item.
